about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a developer and technology enthusiast, constantly seeking personal evolution and quality in software development.

card-left.title: My Journey
card-left.description: My name is Guilherme Fernandes Sebasti達o, a young {{age}} year old developer, currently living in Tubar達o-SC. My passion for computing started early, a curiosity that drove me to want to go beyond being a mere spectator and become a creator. This motivation guides me in my current higher education, a step I consider fundamental to acquiring the discipline and knowledge base necessary to transform my interest into a career. Today, I apply this same dedication to developing complete, efficient, and intuitive applications.
card-left.lists-1: Resident in Tubar達o-SC, open to remote opportunities;
card-left.lists-2: Open to chatting about technology, projects, and new ideas;
card-left.lists-3: Focused on development best practices and clean code;
card-left.lists-4: Always learning and exploring new technologies in development;
card-left.lists-5: Web Development with TypeScript, Java, and modern frameworks;
